Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 3

+25 vs AC; 3d8+8 damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 2

+25 vs AC; 2d8+8 damage.

At-Will

Standard

Reach 4

+23 vs AC; 4d6+8 damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).

Recharge 4-6

Standard

Methenaera makes a claw attack against each enemy within reach. She also makes one bite attack or tail slam attack

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Reach 2, targets the triggering enemy and an enemy flanking with the triggering enemy

Trigger: When an enemy flanking methenaera attacks her, at-will

+25 vs AC; 2d8+8 damage.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Cold

Standard

Close blast 5

+25 vs Reflex; 3d8+8 cold damage, and the target gains vulnerable 10 to all damage (save ends). Miss: Half damage.

Encounter

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Breath weapon recharges, and Methenaera uses it

Encounter ✦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +21 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of Methenaera's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).
Methenaera can make opportunity attacks against each enemy within her reach (3 squares).
Methenaera makes saving throws against ongoing damage at the start of her turn as well as at the end of her turn.
